WorkItem.ClosedComment: Problem is on user's system, not Rawr
WorkItem.Description:
I got a problem with Rawr, this is basicaly what I do and what happens.
1. Open Rawr 2.3.4
2a. Removes "Show start page at launch."
2b. Removes start page. **Freezes**
3a. File **Freezes**
3b. Trying to load from character. **Program not responding**
 
Recorded what happens.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dh5-jpE1Mu8&feature=player_embedded
 
-Sorry for bad explanation. :p

Comments.Message: Same problem happens to me. I was using rawr V2.2.19 without any problem. Then for some virus issues i was forced to format the hole harddrive and reinstall windows XP 32bits on my Pentium 4 3.0Ghz and 1Gb ram. After the reinstall and all the upgrades necessary for windows i tried to run Rawr V2.3.4 and it freezes when i close the Did you know window, and that is as far as i can get. Tried V2.2.19, it freezes less than later versions, but is to hard to work with it since it is a very old versions.
Did you reinstall the latest .NET framework after the format?

I have searched through my computer several times for Virus, Rootkits etc, havent found anything. (Using AVG) 

I have actually gotten a bit further than what I recorded. As furthest I have got to the part after writing my characters name and server and region. Then when it is done loading, it freezes. Tried waiting and see if something happens, but it didn't.

Would really like this to work. :/

From the video it looks like it might be trying to get data from the internet but is failing. Are you online when running the program? Is Rawr allowed to access the internet or has your AV program or Firewall blocked it?

The behaviour you are seeing is very typical of a Rawr install that cannot reach the internet to check for new versions etc.
Yeah, that behavior is most certainly a system issue, nothing on Rawr's side.
